channel.title: Apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browse
channel.description:
i was trying some alternatives to IDM (internet download manager) for linux , and i have found this one:-
http://ugetdm.com/downloads-debian
if u c , it has a plugin called aria2 , and i have installed it. but when i want to download any file the following messages going to appear (because of that plugin i think).
[code] May 15 11:06:16 host kernel: [ 6319.971341] type=1400 audit(1431687976.574:12): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/tmp/orcexec.tHGx2N" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000
May 15 11:06:16 host kernel: [ 6319.971491] type=1400 audit(1431687976.574:13): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/home/user/tor-browser_en-US/Browser/orcexec.UODYTr" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6322.702469] type=1400 audit(1431687979.306:14): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/tmp/orcexec.Y15S0O" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6322.702555] type=1400 audit(1431687979.306:15): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/home/user/tor-browser_en-US/Browser/orcexec.y75G8b" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=1000
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.022460] type=1400 audit(1431687979.626:16): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_bumpscope.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.030010] type=1400 audit(1431687979.634:17): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_corona.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.030440] type=1400 audit(1431687979.634:18): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_flower.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.030896] type=1400 audit(1431687979.634:19): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_infinite.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.031615] type=1400 audit(1431687979.634:20): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_jakdaw.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0
May 15 11:06:19 host kernel: [ 6323.031929] type=1400 audit(1431687979.634:21): apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browser_*/Browser/firefox" name="/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libvisual-0.4/actor/actor_JESS.so" pid=13425 comm="gst-plugin-scan" requested_mask="m" denied_mask="m" fsuid=1000 ouid=0 [/code]
what i want from this report is , thats what will it give if someone trying to install some outside plugins into the browser (in case someone had the same problem/messages in the future). ;)

item.title: Apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browse
item.dc:creator: TNT_BOM_BOM
item.description:
yes , ur correct with no doubt. im just testing what will happen if i do this or that and give the feedback. i think it will be useful for the future reports uses (if someone had the same trail).

Read full topic

item.title: Apparmor="DENIED" operation="file_mmap" parent=13380 profile="/home/*/tor-browse
item.dc:creator: troubadour
item.description:
What do you want to use a download manager for? Is it for resuming, or for accelerating the download, or both? If it’s the former, you could use

It’s safe in Whonix, as everything is torified.

For the latter, I am not sure an accelerator would have much effect with Tor. Patrick could confirm, or disprove.

It’s generally not a good idea to install other plugins than the default ones in Tor Browser, as they might compromise anonymity. And probably not a good idea too, to extend the profile for such use. Pushing the logic, if users are willing to take the risks doing so, they might as well disable AppArmor for the Tor Browser.

Read full topic
